category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_secondary_revision_selector
preference.preference_description: Defines the fallback value of revision selector for secondary objects during an Export operation. If there is no revision satisfying the user-selected revision selector for secondary objects, this revision selector is applied instead during an Export operation. Valid Values: 0 for 'Latest Revision'. 1 for 'Latest Working' . 2 for 'Latest Released'. 3 for 'Latest Working\Any Released Status'. This is a site preference.
